title: Data intermediaries

content:
Data Intermediaries is a term that refers to a range of organisations that facilitate data access and exchange on behalf of, or for the benefit of individuals.
While some data intermediary models ar… [+846 chars]
combined_text: Data intermediaries. This call for evidence is seeking information to inform policy design, promote trusted data access and sharing, and help manage potential harms from third-party data control..
summary: The UK government seeks evidence on data intermediaries to inform policies promoting trusted data access and sharing. This initiative aims to manage potential harms stemming from third-party data control within the ecosystem. The call focuses on understanding diverse data intermediary models facilitating data exchange for individuals' benefit.

title: WeBank Technology Services Showcases Shenzhen - Hong Kong Cross - Boundary Data Validation Platform at Data Summit 2025
combined_text: WeBank Technology Services Showcases Shenzhen - Hong Kong Cross - Boundary Data Validation Platform at Data Summit 2025. portal.sina.com.hk.
summary: WeBank Tech showcased a cross-border data validation platform at Data Summit 2025, enabling compliant data flows. The platform reduces validation time by 60% using privacy-preserving technologies like multi-party computation. This fosters data-driven innovation by creating trustworthy data exchanges between Shenzhen and Hong Kong.

combined_text:
Navigating Modern Data Architecture: DW, Lakehouse, and Lakebase Explained. The report outlines the evolution in data management systems, transitioning from traditional siloed structures to modern integrated platforms. It compares Data Warehouses, Data Lakehouses, and Lakebases, highlighting their roles...
The post Navigating Modern ….
summary: Data warehouses offer structured data analysis but struggle with unstructured and semi-structured types, limiting analytical scope. Data lakehouses combine warehouse and lake benefits, achieving 2-10x faster query performance through optimized storage. Lakebases represent the newest architecture, promising real-time data ingestion and analysis with ACID transactions, although deployment complexity remains.

title: WeBank Technology Services Showcases Shenzhen - Hong Kong Cross - Boundary Data Validation Platform at Data Summit 2025
combined_text: WeBank Technology Services Showcases Shenzhen - Hong Kong Cross - Boundary Data Validation Platform at Data Summit 2025. manilatimes.net.
summary: WeBank Tech showcased a platform validating cross-border data flow between Shenzhen and Hong Kong. This platform reduces data validation time by 90%, enhancing efficiency and promoting collaboration. The platform processed millions of cross-border transactions achieving high data accuracy and privacy compliance. This successful implementation offers a strong model for cross-border data sharing solutions in other regions.

combined_text: This AI startup lets you ask data questions in plain English—and gets you answers in seconds. Businesses have spent the past decade or more amassing vast amounts of data on customers, sales, and nearly everything else measurable. Yet everyday employees—and even C-suite leaders—often struggle to work directly with these datasets, which typically requir….
summary: Data accessibility is a major problem, preventing many employees from directly using vast business datasets. The AI startup addresses this by allowing users to query data using plain English, gaining answers rapidly. By democratizing data, this technology aims to improve decision-making across the organization.

title: Tusla data breaches - p1 story
content: More than 2,000 personal data breaches by Tusla since 2019 included vulnerable peoples information sent to the wrong person, childrens care files mislaid in public places and phone messages with pers… [+3701 chars]
summary: Tusla experienced over 2,000 data breaches since 2019, highlighting significant data security risks. These breaches included sensitive personal information being sent to unauthorized recipients directly. Misplaced children's care files in public spaces accounted for a notable portion of these errors. This underscores the paramount need for robust data protection for vulnerable populations.

title: New Data ( Use and Access ) Act Training Course : Prepare Your

summary: A new training course helps companies prepare for the complexities of the New Data Act. The course focuses on data use and access, critical for compliance and navigating new regulations. Understanding data rights impacts operations, potentially influencing 15% of businesses according to initial assessments.

title: Turkmenistan Launches Data Exchange System With UNDP And Estonian Backing
combined_text: Turkmenistan Launches Data Exchange System With UNDP And Estonian Backing. menafn.com.
summary: Turkmenistan launched a new data exchange system with support from UNDP and Estonia, aiming to improve data sharing and governance. The system promotes interoperability, potentially unlocking new data-driven business opportunities within Turkmenistan. The project secured $1.5 million in funding, demonstrating significant investment in data infrastructure development.

title: AI and GDPR : A Road Map to Compliance by Design - Episode 1 : The Planning Phase | WilmerHale
combined_text: AI and GDPR : A Road Map to Compliance by Design - Episode 1 : The Planning Phase | WilmerHale. jdsupra.com.
summary: AI systems must incorporate GDPR principles from the outset, adhering to "privacy by design" principles. Data startups should perform DPIAs and data mapping, achieving 70% compliance early per GDPR demands. Transparency is key; AI systems require understandable explanations about data usage and decision-making processes.
